main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on January 2, 1958, in Woodridge, England.
interesting points: The object was oval shaped and dull reddish-orange in color, approximately 50 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 13 minutes,The object made sudden movements, turning and lunging before fading to an orange glow and disappearing, Other observations cited in reports included descriptions of the object moving southwest and growing larger before vanishing, Various conclusions suggested it could be an astronomical phenomenon, possibly a satellite, balloon, or aircraft.
witness description: Reports from military personnel including the 79th Fighter Bomber Squadron
